forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 74, with temperatures falling to around 72 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 13 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this evening, the city embraces a tranquil air, buoyed by gentle winds that usher in a calming clarity. The remnants of daylight are slowly giving way to a serene twilight, highlighted by a pleasant temperature hovering around the mid-fifties. Though the forecast hints at partly cloudy skies—a promise of mild warmth lingering into the night—the evening is clear enough to reveal the distant silhouettes of the bay and city against the dusky backdrop. 

As the marine layer retreats, the golden hues of sunset yield to the soft embrace of night. It is a time for quiet reflection or a leisurely stroll along one of the city’s many picturesque avenues. Dressing in layers would be wise, as the brisk wind, particularly from the west, whispers that warmth may wane, and a light jacket could provide comfort without hindering the freedom of movement. Perhaps a visit to an inviting café or an intimate bookstore, where one can drink in the atmosphere and the lingering aroma of freshly brewed coffee, may be just what the evening calls for. Let the serenity of the moment paint your night, as the city continues to hum softly in the twilight.
